item.title: Always-On Diagnostics for Endpoint DLP
item.description: The Era of "Can You Reproduce That?" is Finally Over Introducing Always-on Diagnostics for Endpoint DLP - because your data security shouldn't feel like detective work. If you've ever managed endpoint data security, you know this story by heart. A critical Endpoint Data Loss Prevention policy fails. You open a support ticket. The response? "Can you reproduce the issue on that endpoint?" Three emails later, you're still collecting logs while your team loses precious time, and the underlying problem remains a mystery. Today, that changes. Why We Built This (And Why It Matters) At Microsoft Pu...
